text: Klára Langhoffer-Pétervári (born 31 August 1955) is a Hungarian rower. She competed in the women's double sculls event at the 1980 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:Hungarian female rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Hungary Category:Rowers at the 1980 Summer Olympics Category:Rowers from Budapest
title: Klára Langhoffer-Pétervári
